#include <cstdio>
using namespace std;

int suma(int x)
{
  int rez = 0;
  while(x)
  {
    rez += x%10;
    x /= 10;
  }
  return rez;
}

int main()
{

  int k,n,val;

  scanf("%d", &k);
  while(k--)
  {
    scanf("%d", &n);
    val = 0;
    for(int i=0; i<n; ++i)
      if(i+suma(i)==n)
      {
        printf("%d\n", i);
        val = 1;
        break;
      }
    if(!val)
      puts("NONE");
  }

  return 0;
}
